channel.title: MSN & Gmail Hacked
channel.description:
My msn (frederic_hannes@hotmail.com) has been hacked yesterday, with my gmail account (frederic.hannes@gmail.com) i was able to recover it. Unfortunatly my msn got hacked again today, and my gmail account which used the same password as well. if in any case i would act strange on any forums and such, it could be the hacker. My adresses are linked to every community i reside in, I am trying to get my gmail account back by contacting google, for now i can be reached trough msn on frederic_hannes@msn.com
I am also changing my email adress on every community thats important, so hopefully that won't cause any problems
Recovered! <3 MSN Support

item.title: MSN & Gmail Hacked
item.dc:creator: @Freddy1990 Freddy1990
item.description:
@Freddy1990 wrote:

newbiehacker:

can't you uncheck it from the startup in msconfig and then reboot and delete it while it's not being run?

I tried, but it still boots, but anyway, i reinstalled, currently running vista so it should cause any more damage, now i hope i can get my hotmail and gmail accounts back

Read full topic
